FuncDef: The reset pnp state command restarts PnP on an AP.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If a master cannot manage an AP, you can run the reset pnp state command to restart PnP on the AP.
The master automatically delivers the command to the AP, and you do not need to manually run the command.
Precautions
This command is supported only on the admin VS.
When you directly log in to an AP:
If the AP has established a NETCONF channel to a master, the reset pnp state command cannot be run.If the AP has not established a NETCONF channel to a master, the reset pnp state command can be run.
